ygData.subject: Re: A pred inside Maxi's base (Kitkat)
ygData.msgSnippet: Malice yawned and patted Wolfblade on her shoulder. See you in a few cycles.  If you do get tired, talk to Kup or someone, they should set you up with a room.

Malice yawned and patted Wolfblade on her shoulder.
"See you in a few cycles.  If you do get tired, talk to Kup or someone, they should set you up with a room.  Goodnight."
Malice walked down some halls and found his way to his temporary quarters.  He opened the door and stepped in.  He sat down on the edge of the bed, and sat quiet for a moment.  then he pulled the energon storage and put it on top of the locker.  He opened the locker and snapped off another chunk of energon.  He leaned back on the bed, crunching on the energon.  He finished it, found an alarm clock, set it, and went to sleep.

shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

She worked trying to put together the magnet and improve it to work 
for it's purpose. "No thanks. I'm not tired. I have work to do."Her 
voice was short and curt.  She then looked up at Malice and said in a 
softer tone, "I can't blame you. I'd have done the same thing. I 
wouldn't admit it though."  She looked back at the table and resumed 
her work. 


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice threatened to smack Wolfblade upside her head.
> "I didn't know.  I reprogrammed my signature scanners for specific 
signatures.  Besides, if it were anyone else, I still would have 
saved them.  No one deserves to bleed to death, when help is so near."
> He watched the Predacon, secretly relieved that he was in time to 
put her in the CR chamber.
> "Let's turn in for tonight, I'm tired."
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> She looked at Malice. "You saved a pred? wow, your goodie goodie 
> program must be running in over drive."
> She turned and went back, picked up her stuff and went to a lab to 
> start working. "Preds, an allience if I heard Malice right. Slag, 
> must be because of Unicron. Great, what next, Preds and Maxitrons 
> getting married? Oh wait, there called maximals here."  she worked 
> with a really mad look on her face plates.
> 
>

> wrote:

> > "Well, is this how you repay me for saving your life?  Maybe next 
> time I won't show the same compassion."
> > He looked around again and saw little Camoflage.  He turned back 
to 
> the Predacon.
> > "You may not like an allience as much as me or another die hard 
> Decepticon, but right now we need to hold one.  This is bigger than 
> pride."
> >

hot

spark."

> > > > scrambling to get

> > > hard,
> > > > but his grip 
> > > > was firm.  She stopped as she felt her body reach
> > > low
> > > > energy levels. 
> > > > She looked up at him as she lay in his arms, "Go

> > > > hates me. So I shall never know peace." She was

> > > > but a warrior

> > > > > have an

<DIV>Malice yawned and patted Wolfblade on her shoulder.</DIV>
